shadow.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the dark shape that someone or something makes on a surface when they are between that surface and the light
shadow.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: the long dark shadow of an old oak tree
It was hot, and we decided to walk in the shadow of the wall  (=along the wall, where its shadow would fall).
shadow.translation[0].definitions[1].def: darkness caused by something preventing light from reaching a place
shadow.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The room was half in shadow.
shadow.translation[0].definitions[2].def: the bad effect or influence that something has, which makes other things seem less enjoyable, attractive, or impressive
shadow.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: The events of September 11th cast a shadow over the celebrations.
For years, people had been living under the shadow of communism.
shadow.translation[0].note_box[0].sectio: The building cast a shadow across the narrow street.
The footsteps came closer, and a shadow fell across the table.
She saw the dark shadow of a man in the doorway.
Long shadows stretched across the grass from the apple trees.
Candles cast strange flickering shadows on the walls.
shadow.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to follow someone closely in order to watch what they are doing
shadow.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to cover something with a shadow, or make it dark
shadow.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: a narrow street which was shadowed by a huge Catholic church
shadow.translation[1].definitions[1].not: Shadow is usually passive in this meaning
shadow.translation[3].definitions[0].def: to watch someone very closely or work with them in order to learn how they do their job
shadow.translation[3].definitions[0].exa: The managers were shadowed by trainees in the bank’s development programme.
shadow.translation[3].definitions[1].def: to change at the same rate or in the same way as something
shadow.translation[3].definitions[1].exa: In London, share prices shadowed Wall Street’s, to close midway.
Gloomy news in the technology sector was shadowed by smaller electronics stocks.
